channel.title: Do I have to leave the desktop wallet running to stake Radix?
channel.description:
No, there's no need to leave your wallet open for staking to happen! Radix uses a **DPoS** (***D**elegated **P**roof **o**f **S**take*) system to reach consensus, which is different compared to a **PoW** (***P**roof **o**f **W**ork*) system like Bitcoin. Your stake is being handled by the validator node you delegated it to.
You can obviously also turn off your computer.
